mnd13:3.2: Ye keciti sabbena sabbam sabbatha sabbam asesam nissesam pariyadiyanavacanametam—
mnd13:3.6: te dvasatthiya ditthigatanam annatarannataram ditthigatam gahetva uggahetva ganhitva paramasitva abhinivisitva sakaya sakaya ditthiya vasanti samvasanti avasanti parivasanti.
mnd13:3.7: Yatha agarika va gharesu vasanti, sapattika va apattisu vasanti, sakilesa va kilesesu vasanti;
mnd13:4.2: “Sassato loko, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti vadanti kathenti bhananti dipayanti voharanti.
mnd13:4.4: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti vadanti kathenti bhananti dipayanti voharantiti—
mnd13:5.2: Sabbeva te samanabrahmana nindameva anventi, garahameva anventi, akittimeva anventi;
mnd13:5.3: sabbe ninditayeva honti, garahitayeva honti, akittitayeva hontiti—
mnd13:6.2: Tattha sakaya ditthiya sakaya khantiya sakaya ruciya sakaya laddhiya pasamsam thomanam kittim vannaharikam labhanti patilabhanti upagacchanti vindantiti—
mnd13:10.2: Appanhi etanti appakam etam, omakam etam, thokakam etam, lamakam etam, chatukkam etam, parittakam etanti—
mnd13:10.4: Na alam samayati nalam ragassa samaya, dosassa samaya, mohassa samaya, kodhassa … upanahassa … makkhassa … palasassa … issaya … macchariyassa … mayaya … satheyyassa … thambhassa … sarambhassa … manassa … atimanassa … madassa … pamadassa … sabbakilesanam … sabbaduccaritanam … sabbadarathanam … sabbaparilahanam … sabbasantapanam … sabbakusalabhisankharanam samaya upasamaya vupasamaya nibbanaya patinissaggaya patipassaddhiyati—
mnd13:11.2: Ditthikalahassa ditthibhandanassa ditthiviggahassa ditthivivadassa ditthimedhagassa dve phalani honti—
mnd13:11.3: jayaparajayo hoti, labhalabho hoti, yasayaso hoti, nindapasamso hoti, sukhadukkham hoti, somanassadomanassam hoti, itthanittham hoti, anunayapatigham hoti, ugghatinigghati hoti, anurodhavirodho hoti.
mnd13:11.4: Atha va tam kammam nirayasamvattanikam, tiracchanayonisamvattanikam, pettivisayasamvattanikanti brumi acikkhami desemi pannapemi patthapemi vivarami vibhajami uttanikaromi pakasemiti—
mnd13:12.2: Etampi disvati etam adinavam disva passitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva ditthikalahesu ditthibhandanesu ditthiviggahesu ditthivivadesu ditthimedhagesuti—
mnd13:12.4: Na vivadayethati na kalaham kareyya, na bhandanam kareyya, na viggaham kareyya, na vivadam kareyya, na medhagam kareyya, kalaham bhandanam viggaham vivadam medhagam pajaheyya vinodeyya byantim kareyya anabhavam gameyya, kalaha bhandana viggaha vivada medhaga arato assa virato pativirato nikkhanto nissato vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa vihareyyati—
mnd13:13.3: Yo so sabbasankharasamatho sabbupadhipatinissaggo tanhakkhayo virago nirodho nibbanam.
mnd13:13.4: Etam avivadabhumim khemato tanato lenato saranato abhayato accutato amatato nibbanato passanto dakkhanto olokento nijjhayanto upaparikkhantoti—
mnd13:17.2: Ya kaciti sabbena sabbam sabbatha sabbam asesam nissesam pariyadiyanavacanametam—
mnd13:17.6: Puthujjati puthujjanehi janita sammutiyoti puthujja, puthu nanajanehi janita va sammutiyoti puthujjati—
mnd13:18.3: Sabbava eta ditthisammutiyo neti na upeti na upagacchati na ganhati na paramasati nabhinivisatiti—
mnd13:19.7: tanhupayassa pahinatta, ditthupayassa patinissatthatta anupayo puggalo kim rupam upeyya upagaccheyya ganheyya paramaseyya abhiniveseyya atta meti.
mnd13:19.17: kim vattam upeyya upagaccheyya ganheyya paramaseyya abhiniveseyyati—
mnd13:20.2: Ditthe va ditthasuddhiya va sute va sutasuddhiya va mute va mutasuddhiya va khantim akubbamano chandam akubbamano pemam akubbamano ragam akubbamano ajanayamano asanjanayamano anibbattayamano anabhinibbattayamanoti—
mnd13:24.3: te silamattena sannamamattena samvaramattena avitikkamamattena suddhim visuddhim parivisuddhim, muttim vimuttim parivimuttim ahamsu vadanti kathenti bhananti dipayanti voharanti.
mnd13:25.2: “catuhi kho aham, gahapati, dhammehi samannagatam purisapuggalam pannapemi sampannakusalam paramakusalam uttamapattipattam samanam ayojjham.
mnd13:25.4: Idha, gahapati, na kayena papakammam karoti, na papikam vacam bhasati, na papakam sankappam sankappeti, na papakam ajivam ajivati.
mnd13:25.5: Imehi kho aham, gahapati, catuhi dhammehi samannagatam purisapuggalam pannapemi sampannakusalam paramakusalam uttamapattipattam samanam ayojjham;
mnd13:25.7: te silamattena sannamamattena samvaramattena avitikkamamattena suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim, muttim vimuttim parimuttim ahamsu vadanti kathenti bhananti dipayanti voharanti”ti—
mnd13:26.2: Vatanti hatthivatam va assavatam va govatam va kukkuravatam va kakavatam va vasudevavatam va baladevavatam va punnabhaddavatam va manibhaddavatam va aggivatam va nagavatam va supannavatam va yakkhavatam va asuravatam va gandhabbavatam va maharajavatam va candavatam va suriyavatam va indavatam va brahmavatam va devavatam va disavatam va adaya samadaya adiyitva samadiyitva ganhitva paramasitva abhinivisitva upatthita paccupatthita allina upagata ajjhosita adhimuttati—
mnd13:27.2: Idhati sakaya ditthiya sakaya khantiya sakaya ruciya sakaya laddhiya.
mnd13:27.5: Athassa suddhinti athassa suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim, muttim vimuttim parimuttinti—
mnd13:28.4: Kusalavadanati kusalavada panditavada thiravada nayavada hetuvada lakkhanavada karanavada thanavada sakaya laddhiyati—
mnd13:32.3: paravicchindanaya va cavati, anabhisambhunanto va cavati.
mnd13:32.5: Paro vicchindati so sattha na sabbannu, dhammo na svakkhato, gano na suppatipanno, ditthi na bhaddika, patipada na supannatta, maggo na niyyaniko, natthettha suddhi va visuddhi va parisuddhi va, mutti va vimutti va parimutti va, natthettha sujjhanti va visujjhanti va parisujjhanti va, muccanti va vimuccanti va, parimuccanti va, hina nihina omaka lamaka chatukka parittati.
mnd13:32.7: Evam vicchindiyamano satthara cavati, dhammakkhana cavati, gana cavati, ditthiya cavati, patipadaya cavati, maggato cavati.
mnd13:32.10: Silam anabhisambhunanto silato cavati, vatam anabhisambhunanto vatato cavati, silabbatam anabhisambhunanto silabbatato cavati.
mnd13:33.2: Pavedhatiti silam va vatam va silabbatam va “viraddham maya, aparaddham maya, khalitam maya, galitam maya, annaya aparaddho ahan”ti vedhati pavedhati sampavedhatiti—
mnd13:33.4: Kamma viradhayitvati punnabhisankharam va apunnabhisankharam va anenjabhisankharam va “viraddham maya, aparaddham maya, khalitam maya, galitam maya, annaya aparaddho ahan”ti vedhati pavedhati sampavedhatiti—
mnd13:34.2: Pajappatiti silam va jappati, vatam va jappati, silabbatam va jappati pajappati abhijappatiti—
mnd13:34.4: Patthayati ca suddhinti silasuddhim va pattheti, vatasuddhim va pattheti, silabbatasuddhim va pattheti piheti abhijappatiti—
mnd13:35.2: Yatha puriso gharato nikkhanto satthena pavasam vasanto sattha ohino, tam va sattham anubandhati sakam va gharam paccagacchati;
mnd13:35.3: evamevam so ditthigatiko tam va sattharam ganhati annam va sattharam ganhati, tam va dhammakkhanam ganhati annam va dhammakkhanam ganhati, tam va ganam ganhati annam va ganam ganhati, tam va ditthim ganhati annam va ditthim ganhati, tam va patipadam ganhati annam va patipadam ganhati, tam va maggam ganhati annam va maggam ganhati paramasati abhinivisatiti—
mnd13:39.2: Sabba silasuddhiyo pahaya pajahitva vinodetva byantim karitva anabhavam gametva, sabba vatasuddhiyo pahaya pajahitva vinodetva byantim karitva anabhavam gametva, sabba silabbatasuddhiyo pahaya pajahitva vinodetva byantim karitva anabhavam gametvati—
mnd13:40.6: Savajjanca kammam anavajjanca kammam pahaya pajahitva vinodetva byantim karitva anabhavam gametvati—
mnd13:41.4: asuddhim patthenti, akusale dhamme patthenti, panca kamagune patthenti;
mnd13:41.5: suddhim patthenti, dvasatthi ditthigatani patthenti, asuddhim patthenti, akusale dhamme patthenti, panca kamagune patthenti, dvasatthi ditthigatani patthenti;
mnd13:41.7: tedhatuke kusale dhamme patthenti, asuddhim patthenti, akusale dhamme patthenti, panca kamagune patthenti, dvasatthi ditthigatani patthenti, tedhatuke kusale dhamme patthenti;
mnd13:41.10: Arahatte patte araha neva akusale dhamme pattheti, napi panca kamagune pattheti, napi dvasatthi ditthigatani pattheti, napi tedhatuke kusale dhamme pattheti, napi niyamavakkantim pattheti, napi aggadhammam arahattam pattheti.
mnd13:42.2: Viratoti suddhiasuddhiya arato assa virato pativirato nikkhanto nissato vippamutto visannutto, vimariyadikatena cetasa viharatiti—
mnd13:42.4: Careti careyya vicareyya vihareyya iriyeyya vatteyya paleyya yapeyya yapeyyati—
mnd13:42.7: Santiyo vuccanti dvasatthi ditthigatani ditthisantiyo aganhanto aparamasanto anabhinivisantoti—
mnd13:45.2: Atha vapi dittham va sutam mutam va;
mnd13:46.2: Santeke samanabrahmana tapojigucchavada tapojigucchasara tapojigucchanissita anissita allina upagata ajjhosita adhimuttati—
mnd13:47.1: Atha vapi dittham va sutam mutam vati.
mnd13:47.2: Dittham va ditthasuddhim va sutam va sutasuddhim va mutam va mutasuddhim va nissaya upanissaya ganhitva paramasitva abhinivisitvati—
mnd13:47.3: atha vapi dittham va sutam mutam va.
mnd13:48.4: Ye te samanabrahmana accantasuddhika, samsarasuddhika, akiriyaditthika, sassatavada—
mnd13:48.6: Te samsare suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim, muttim vimuttim parimuttim thunanti vadanti kathenti bhananti dipayanti voharantiti—
mnd13:49.2: Tanhati rupatanha saddatanha gandhatanha rasatanha photthabbatanha dhammatanha.
mnd13:49.3: Bhavabhavesuti bhavabhave kammabhave punabbhave kamabhave, kammabhave kamabhave punabbhave rupabhave, kammabhave rupabhave punabbhave arupabhave, kammabhave arupabhave punabbhave punappunabbhave punappunagatiya punappunaupapattiya punappunapatisandhiya punappunaattabhavabhinibbattiya avitatanha avigatatanha acattatanha avantatanha amuttatanha appahinatanha appatinissatthatanhati—
mnd13:51.2: Atha vapi dittham va sutam mutam va;
mnd13:53.3: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
mnd13:53.8: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulanti—
mnd13:54.7: Pakappitam vatthum acchedasankinopi vedhenti, acchijjantepi vedhenti, acchinnepi vedhenti;
mnd13:54.8: pakappitam vatthum viparinamasankinopi vedhenti, viparinamantepi vedhenti, viparinatepi vedhenti pavedhenti sampavedhentiti—
mnd13:55.3: Yassa gamanam agamanam gamanagamanam kalam gati bhavabhavo cuti ca upapatti ca nibbatti ca bhedo ca jati ca jaramarananca natthi na santi na samvijjanti nupalabbhanti, pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddhati—
mnd13:56.2: So kena ragena vedheyya, kena dosena vedheyya, kena mohena vedheyya, kena manena vedheyya, kaya ditthiya vedheyya, kena uddhaccena vedheyya, kaya vicikicchaya vedheyya, kehi anusayehi vedheyya—
mnd13:56.3: rattoti va dutthoti va mulhoti va vinibaddhoti va paramatthoti va vikkhepagatoti va anitthangatoti va thamagatoti va.
mnd13:56.6: nerayikoti va tiracchanayonikoti va pettivisayikoti va manussoti va devoti va rupiti va arupiti va sanniti va asanniti va nevasanninasanniti va, so hetu natthi paccayo natthi karanam natthi yena vedheyya pavedheyya sampavedheyyati—
mnd13:56.8: Kuhimva jappeti kuhim va jappeyya kimhi jappeyya, kattha jappeyya pajappeyya abhijappeyyati—
mnd13:56.9: sa kena vedheyya kuhim va jappe.
mnd13:58.4: Sa kena vedheyya kuhim va jappe”ti.
mnd13:60.2: Yam dhammam ditthim patipadam maggam eke samanabrahmana “idam paramam aggam settham visittham pamokkham uttamam pavaran”ti, evamahamsu evam kathenti evam bhananti evam dipayanti evam voharantiti—
mnd13:61.1: Tameva hinanti panahu anneti tameva dhammam ditthim patipadam maggam eke samanabrahmana “hinam etam, nihinam etam, omakam etam, lamakam etam, chatukkam etam, parittakam etan”ti, evamahamsu evam kathenti evam bhananti evam dipayanti evam voharantiti—
mnd13:62.2: Imesam samanabrahmananam vado katamo sacco taccho tatho bhuto yathavo aviparitoti—
mnd13:63.2: Sabbevime samanabrahmana kusalavada panditavada thiravada nayavada hetuvada lakkhanavada karanavada thanavada sakaya laddhiyati—
mnd13:67.1: Sakanhi dhammam paripunnamahuti sakam dhammam ditthim patipadam maggam eke samanabrahmana “idam samattam paripunnam anoman”ti, evamahamsu …pe…
mnd13:68.2: Annassa dhammam ditthim patipadam maggam eke samanabrahmana “hinam etam, nihinam etam, omakam etam, lamakam etam, chatukkam etam, parittakam etan”ti, evamahamsu evam kathenti evam bhananti evam dipayanti evam voharantiti—
mnd13:69.1: Evampi viggayha vivadayantiti evam gahetva uggahetva ganhitva paramasitva abhinivisitva vivadayanti, kalaham karonti, bhandanam karonti, viggaham karonti, vivadam karonti, medhagam karonti—
mnd13:70.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti—
mnd13:74.1: Parassa ce vambhayitena hinoti parassa ce vambhayitakarana ninditakarana garahitakarana upavaditakarana paro balo hoti hino nihino omako lamako chatukko parittoti—
mnd13:75.2: Dhammesu na koci aggo settho visittho pamokkho uttamo pavaro assati—
mnd13:76.2: Bahukapi bahunam dhammam vadanti upavadanti nindanti garahanti hinato nihinato omakato lamakato chatukkato parittato, bahukapi ekassa dhammam vadanti upavadanti nindanti garahanti hinato nihinato omakato lamakato chatukkato parittato, ekopi bahunam dhammam vadati upavadati nindati garahati hinato nihinato omakato lamakato chatukkato parittato, ekopi ekassa dhammam vadati upavadati nindati garahati hinato nihinato omakato lamakato chatukkato parittatoti—
mnd13:77.2: Dhammo sakayanam, ditthi sakayanam, patipada sakayanam, maggo sakayanam, sakayane dalhavada thiravada balikavada atthitavadati—
mnd13:81.3: Sakam sattharam sakkaroti garum karoti maneti pujeti “ayam sattha sabbannu”ti—
mnd13:81.5: Sakam dhammakkhanam sakam ganam sakam ditthim sakam patipadam sakam maggam sakkaroti garum karoti maneti pujeti “ayam maggo niyyaniko”ti—
mnd13:81.7: Saddhammapujapi nesam tathevati saddhammapuja tatha taccha bhuta yathava aviparitati—
mnd13:82.2: Dhammo sakayanam ditthi sakayanam patipada sakayanam maggo sakayanam, sakayanani pasamsanti thomenti kittenti vannentiti—
mnd13:83.1: Sabbeva vada tathiya bhaveyyunti sabbeva vada tatha taccha bhuta yathava aviparita bhaveyyunti—
mnd13:84.2: Paccattameva tesam samanabrahmananam suddhi visuddhi parisuddhi, mutti vimutti parimuttiti—
mnd13:88.3: Brahmanoti sattannam dhammanam bahitatta brahmano …pe… asito tadi pavuccate sa brahma.
mnd13:88.4: Na brahmanassa paraneyyamatthiti brahmanassa paraneyyata natthi, brahmano na paraneyyo, na parapattiyo, na parapaccayo, na parapatibaddhagu janati passati asammulho sampajano patissato.
mnd13:88.5: “Sabbe sankhara anicca”ti brahmanassa paraneyyata natthi, brahmano na paraneyyo, na parapattiyo, na parapaccayo, na parapatibaddhagu janati passati asammulho sampajano patissato.
mnd13:88.7: “yam kinci samudayadhammam sabbam tam nirodhadhamman”ti brahmanassa paraneyyata natthi, brahmano na paraneyyo, na parapattiyo, na parapaccayo, na parapatibaddhagu janati passati asammulho sampajano patissatoti—
mnd13:89.3: Niccheyyati nicchinitva vinicchinitva vicinitva pavicinitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva.
mnd13:89.4: Samuggahitanti odhiggaho bilaggaho varaggaho kotthasaggaho uccayaggaho samuccayaggaho “idam saccam tatham bhutam yathavam aviparitan”ti gahitam paramattham abhinivittham ajjhositam adhimuttam natthi na santi na samvijjati nupalabbhati, pahinam samucchinnam vupasantam patipassaddham abhabbuppattikam nanaggina daddhanti—
mnd13:90.2: Tasmati tasma tankarana tamhetu tappaccaya tamnidana ditthikalahani ditthibhandanani ditthiviggahani ditthivivadani ditthimedhagani upativatto atikkanto samatikkanto vitivattoti—
mnd13:91.2: Annam sattharam dhammakkhanam ganam ditthim patipadam maggam annatra satipatthanehi, annatra sammappadhanehi, annatra iddhipadehi, annatra indriyehi, annatra balehi, annatra bojjhangehi, annatra ariya atthangika magga, aggam settham visittham pamokkham uttamam pavaram dhammam na passati na dakkhati na oloketi na nijjhayati na upaparikkhatiti—
mnd13:95.2: Janamiti paracittananena va janami, pubbenivasanussatinanena va janami.
mnd13:95.3: Passamiti mamsacakkhuna va passami, dibbena cakkhuna va passami.
mnd13:95.4: Tatheva etanti etam tatham taccham bhutam yathavam aviparitanti—
mnd13:96.2: Ditthiya eke samanabrahmana suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim, muttim vimuttim parimuttim paccenti.
mnd13:96.3: “Sassato loko, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti ditthiya eke samanabrahmana suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim, muttim vimuttim parimuttim paccenti.
mnd13:96.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti ditthiya eke samanabrahmana suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim, muttim vimuttim parimuttim paccentiti—
mnd13:97.2: Adakkhiti paracittananena va adakkhi, pubbenivasanussatinanena va adakkhi, mamsacakkhuna va adakkhi, dibbena cakkhuna va adakkhiti—
mnd13:97.6: Na dukkhaparinna atthi, na samudayassa pahanam atthi, na maggabhavana atthi, na phalasacchikiriya atthi, na ragassa samucchedapahanam atthi, na dosassa samucchedapahanam atthi, na mohassa samucchedapahanam atthi, na kilesanam samucchedapahanam atthi, na samsaravattassa upacchedo atthiti—
mnd13:98.1: Atisitva annena vadanti suddhinti te titthiya suddhimaggam visuddhimaggam parisuddhimaggam vodatamaggam parivodatamaggam atikkamitva samatikkamitva vitivattitva annatra satipatthanehi, annatra sammappadhanehi, annatra iddhipadehi, annatra indriyehi, annatra balehi, annatra bojjhangehi, annatra ariya atthangika magga suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim, muttim vimuttim parimuttim vadanti kathenti bhananti dipayanti voharantiti.
mnd13:99.1: Atha va buddha ca buddhasavaka ca paccekabuddha ca tesam titthiyanam asuddhimaggam avisuddhimaggam aparisuddhimaggam avodatamaggam aparivodatamaggam atikkamitva samatikkamitva vitivattitva catuhi satipatthanehi catuhi sammappadhanehi catuhi iddhipadehi pancahi indriyehi pancahi balehi sattahi bojjhangehi ariyena atthangikena maggena suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim, muttim vimuttim parimuttim vadanti kathenti bhananti dipayanti voharantiti—
mnd13:103.1: Passam naro dakkhati namarupanti passam naro dakkhati paracittananena va passanto, pubbenivasanussatinanena va passanto, mamsacakkhuna va passanto, dibbena cakkhuna va passanto namarupamyeva dakkhati niccato sukhato attato, na tesam dhammanam samudayam va atthangamam va assadam va adinavam va nissaranam va dakkhatiti—
mnd13:104.2: Disvati paracittananena va disva, pubbenivasanussatinanena va disva, mamsacakkhuna va disva, dibbena cakkhuna va disva, namarupamyeva disva nassati niccato sukhato attato, na tesam dhammanam samudayam va atthangamam va assadam va adinavam va nissaranam va nassatiti—
mnd13:105.2: Kamam bahukam va passanto namarupam appakam va niccato sukhato attatoti—
mnd13:106.2: Kusalati ye te khandhakusala dhatukusala ayatanakusala paticcasamuppadakusala satipatthanakusala sammappadhanakusala iddhipadakusala indriyakusala balakusala bojjhangakusala maggakusala phalakusala nibbanakusala, te kusala paracittananena va pubbenivasanussatinanena va mamsacakkhuna va dibbena cakkhuna va namarupadassanena suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim muttim vimuttim parimuttim na vadanti na kathenti na bhananti na dipayanti na voharantiti—
mnd13:106.3: na hi tena suddhim kusala vadanti.
mnd13:108.4: Na hi tena suddhim kusala vadanti”ti.
mnd13:110.4: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti—
mnd13:110.7: Nivissavadi dubbinayo duppannapayo dunnijjhapayo duppekkhapayo duppasadayoti—
mnd13:111.2: Kappita pakappita abhisankhata santhapita ditthim purekkhato katva carati.
mnd13:111.3: Ditthidhajo ditthiketu ditthadhipateyyo ditthiya parivarito caratiti—
mnd13:112.2: Yam nissitoti yam sattharam dhammakkhanam ganam ditthim patipadam maggam nissito anissito allino upagato ajjhosito adhimuttoti—
mnd13:112.4: Tatthati sakaya ditthiya sakaya khantiya sakaya ruciya sakaya laddhiya.
mnd13:112.5: Subham vadanoti subhavado sobhanavado panditavado thiravado nayavado hetuvado lakkhanavado karanavado thanavado sakaya laddhiyati—
mnd13:113.3: Atha va suddhidassano visuddhidassano parisuddhidassano vodatadassano parivodatadassanoti—
mnd13:113.5: Tatthati sakaya ditthiya sakaya khantiya sakaya ruciya sakaya laddhiya tatham taccham bhutam yathavam aviparitanti addassa adakkhi apassi pativijjhiti—
mnd13:117.3: Brahmanoti sattannam dhammanam bahitatta brahmano …pe… asito tadi pavuccate sa brahma.
mnd13:117.9: Ya panna pajanana …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammaditthi.
mnd13:117.11: Brahmano sankhaya janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva.
mnd13:117.14: yam kinci samudayadhammam sabbam tam nirodhadhamman”ti sankhaya janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva tanhakappam va ditthikappam va neti na upeti na upagacchati na ganhati na paramasati nabhinivisatiti—
mnd13:118.2: Tassa dvasatthi ditthigatani pahinani samucchinnani vupasantani patipassaddhani abhabbuppattikani nanaggina daddhani.
mnd13:118.3: So ditthiya na yayati na niyati na vuyhati na samhariyati napi tam ditthigatam sarato pacceti na paccagacchatiti—
mnd13:118.5: Napi nanabandhuti atthasamapattinanena va pancabhinnananena va tanhabandhum va ditthibandhum va na karoti na janeti na sanjaneti na nibbatteti nabhinibbattetiti—
mnd13:119.2: Natvati natva janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva.
mnd13:119.3: “Sabbe sankhara anicca”ti natva janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva,
mnd13:119.5: “yam kinci samudayadhammam sabbam tam nirodhadhamman”ti natva janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katvati—
mnd13:119.10: Puthu nanajanehi janita va sammutiyoti puthujjati—
mnd13:120.2: Anne tanhavasena ditthivasena ganhanti paramasanti abhinivisanti.
mnd13:120.3: Araha upekkhati na ganhati na paramasati nabhinivisatiti—
mnd13:124.3: abhijjha kayagantho, byapado kayagantho, silabbataparamaso kayagantho, idamsaccabhiniveso kayagantho.
mnd13:124.4: Attano ditthiya rago abhijjha kayagantho, paravadesu aghato appaccayo byapado kayagantho, attano silam va vatam va silabbatam va paramasati silabbataparamaso kayagantho, attano ditthi idamsaccabhiniveso kayagantho.
mnd13:124.6: Atha va ganthe gathite ganthite bandhe vibandhe abandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane photayitva vissajja.
mnd13:124.7: Yatha vayham va ratham va sakatam va sandamanikam va sajjam vissajjam karonti vikopenti;
mnd13:124.9: Atha va ganthe gathite ganthite bandhe vibandhe abandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane photayitva vissajja.
mnd13:125.2: Vivadajatesu sanjatesu nibbattesu abhinibbattesu patubhutesu chandagatim gacchantesu dosagatim gacchantesu bhayagatim gacchantesu mohagatim gacchantesu na chandagatim gacchati, na dosagatim gacchati, na bhayagatim gacchati, na mohagatim gacchati, na ragavasena gacchati, na dosavasena gacchati, na mohavasena gacchati, na manavasena gacchati, na ditthivasena gacchati, na uddhaccavasena gacchati, na vicikicchavasena gacchati, na anusayavasena gacchati, na vaggehi dhammehi yayati niyati vuyhati samhariyatiti—
mnd13:126.2: Santoti ragassa santatta santo, dosassa santatta santo, mohassa santatta santo …pe… sabbakusalabhisankharanam santatta samitatta vupasamitatta vijjhatatta nibbutatta vigatatta patipassaddhatta santo upasanto vupasanto nibbuto patipassaddhoti—
mnd13:126.6: Upekkhako soti araha chalangupekkhaya samannagato cakkhuna rupam disva neva sumano hoti na dummano upekkhako viharati sato sampajano.
mnd13:127.2: Anne tanhavasena ditthivasena ganhante paramasante abhinivisante.
mnd13:127.3: Araha upekkhati na ganhati na paramasati nabhinivisatiti—
mnd13:131.3: Atite sankhare arabbha ye kilesa uppajjeyyum te kilese hitva cajitva pariccajitva pajahitva vinodetva byantim karitva anabhavam gametvati—
mnd13:131.6: Paccuppanne sankhare arabbha chandam akubbamano pemam akubbamano ragam akubbamano ajanayamano asanjanayamano anibbattayamano anabhinibbattayamanoti—
mnd13:132.2: Na chandagatim gacchati, na dosagatim gacchati, na mohagatim gacchati, na bhayagatim gacchati, na ragavasena gacchati, na dosavasena gacchati, na mohavasena gacchati, na manavasena gacchati, na ditthivasena gacchati, na uddhaccavasena gacchati, na vicikicchavasena gacchati, na anusayavasena gacchati, na vaggehi dhammehi yayati niyati vuyhati na samhariyatiti—
mnd13:132.4: Nopi nivissavaditi “sassato loko, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti na nivissavadi …pe…
mnd13:132.5: “neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti na nivissavaditi—
mnd13:133.1: Sa vippamutto ditthigatehi dhiroti tassa dvasatthi ditthigatani pahinani samucchinnani vupasantani patipassaddhani abhabbuppattikani nanaggina daddhani.
mnd13:133.2: So ditthigatehi vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharati.
mnd13:133.3: Dhiroti dhiro pandito pannava buddhima nani vibhavi medhaviti—
mnd13:134.7: tassa tanhalepassa pahinatta, ditthilepassa patinissatthatta apayaloke na limpati, manussaloke na limpati, devaloke na limpati, khandhaloke na limpati, dhatuloke na limpati, ayatanaloke na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati, alitto apalitto anupalitto nikkhanto nissato vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharatiti—
mnd13:135.3: Katham katatta ca akatatta ca attanam garahati?
mnd13:135.4: “Katam me kayaduccaritam, akatam me kayasucaritan”ti attanam garahati.
mnd13:135.8: kata me micchaditthi, akata me sammaditthi”ti attanam garahati.
mnd13:135.9: Evam katatta ca akatatta ca attanam garahati.
mnd13:136.1: Atha va “silesumhi na paripurakari”ti attanam garahati.
mnd13:136.17: Evam katatta ca akatatta ca attanam garahati.
mnd13:136.19: Tayidam kammam akubbamano ajanayamano asanjanayamano anibbattayamano anabhinibbattayamano anattagarahiti—
mnd13:139.2: Yam kinci dittham va sutam mutam va;
mnd13:140.1: Sa sabbadhammesu visenibhuto yam kinci dittham va sutam mutam vati.
mnd13:140.3: Kayaduccaritam marasena, vaciduccaritam marasena, manoduccaritam marasena, rago … doso … moho … kodho … upanaho … makkho … palaso … issa … macchariyam … maya … satheyyam … thambho … sarambho … mano … atimano … mado … pamado … sabbe kilesa … sabbe duccarita … sabbe daratha … sabbe parilaha … sabbe santapa … sabbakusalabhisankhara marasena.
mnd13:143.1: Yato catuhi ariyamaggehi sabba ca marasena sabbe ca patisenikara kilesa jita ca parajita ca bhagga vippalugga parammukha—
mnd13:143.7: sa sabbadhammesu visenibhuto, yam kinci dittham va sutam mutam va.
mnd13:144.5: Patisandhiya rupam vedana sanna sankhara vinnanam—
mnd13:144.14: Yato khandhabharo ca kilesabharo ca abhisankharabharo ca pahina honti ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma, so vuccati pannabharo patitabharo oropitabharo samoropitabharo nikkhittabharo patipassaddhabharo.
mnd13:145.2: Ya panna pajanana vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhana upalakkhana paccupalakkhana, pandiccam kosallam nepunnam vebhabya cinta upaparikkha bhuri medha parinayika vipassana sampajannam patodo panna pannindriyam pannabalam pannasattham pannapasado pannaaloko pannaobhaso pannapajjoto pannaratanam amoho dhammavicayo sammaditthi.
mnd13:146.4: Tividhanam kayaduccaritanam pahanam kayamoneyyam, tividham kayasucaritam kayamoneyyam, kayarammane nanam kayamoneyyam, kayaparinna kayamoneyyam, parinnasahagato maggo kayamoneyyam, kaye chandaragassa pahanam kayamoneyyam, kayasankharanirodho catutthajjhanasamapatti kayamoneyyam—
mnd13:147.2: Catubbidhanam vaciduccaritanam pahanam vacimoneyyam, catubbidham vacisucaritam vacimoneyyam, vacarammane nanam vacimoneyyam, vacaparinna vacimoneyyam, parinnasahagato maggo vacimoneyyam, vacaya chandaragassa pahanam vacimoneyyam, vacisankharanirodho dutiyajjhanasamapatti vacimoneyyam—
mnd13:148.2: Tividhanam manoduccaritanam pahanam manomoneyyam, tividham manosucaritam manomoneyyam, cittarammane nanam manomoneyyam, cittaparinna manomoneyyam, parinnasahagato maggo manomoneyyam, citte chandaragassa pahanam manomoneyyam, cittasankharanirodho sannavedayitanirodhasamapatti manomoneyyam—
mnd13:151.1: Imehi tihi moneyyehi dhammehi samannagata cha munino—
mnd13:151.2: agaramunino, anagaramunino, sekhamunino, asekhamunino, paccekamunino, munimuninoti.
mnd13:155.1: Vippamuttoti munino raga cittam muttam vimuttam suvimuttam;
mnd13:156.7: tanhakappassa pahinatta ditthikappassa patinissatthatta tanhakappam va ditthikappam va na kappeti na janeti na sanjaneti na nibbatteti nabhinibbattetiti—
mnd13:156.10: Sabbe balaputhujjana rajjanti, puthujjanakalyanakam upadaya satta sekha appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya aramanti viramanti pativiramanti, araha arato virato pativirato nikkhanto nissato vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharatiti—
mnd13:156.14: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
mnd13:156.15: Yassesa patthana tanha pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddha, so vuccati na patthiyo.
mnd13:157.12: bhaji va bhagava arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani appasaddani appanigghosani vijanavatani manussarahasseyyakani patisallanasaruppaniti bhagava,
mnd13:157.14: bhagi va bhagava attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa adhisilassa adhicittassa adhipannayati bhagava,
mnd13:157.15: bhagi va bhagava catunnam jhananam catunnam appamannanam catunnam arupasamapattinanti bhagava,
mnd13:157.16: bhagi va bhagava atthannam vimokkhanam atthannam abhibhayatananam navannam anupubbaviharasamapattinanti bhagava,
mnd13:157.17: bhagi va bhagava dasannam sannabhavananam dasannam kasinasamapattinam anapanassatisamadhissa asubhasamapattiyati bhagava,
mnd13:157.18: bhagi va bhagava catunnam satipatthananam catunnam sammappadhananam catunnam iddhipadanam pancannam indriyanam pancannam balanam sattannam bojjhanganam ariyassa atthangikassa maggassati bhagava,
mnd13:157.19: bhagi va bhagava dasannam tathagatabalanam catunnam vesarajjanam catunnam patisambhidanam channam abhinnanam channam buddhadhammananti bhagava,
mnd13:157.20: bhagavati netam namam matara katam na pitara katam na bhatara katam na bhaginiya katam na mittamaccehi katam na natisalohitehi katam na samanabrahmanehi katam na devatahi katam;
mnd13:157.21: vimokkhantikametam buddhanam bhagavantanam bodhiya mule saha sabbannutannanassa patilabha sacchika pannatti yadidam bhagavati—
mnd13:157.22: na kappiyo nuparato na patthiyo iti bhagava.
mnd13:159.2: Yam kinci dittham va sutam mutam va;
